name: Get Down! (Matt Camerato)
description:
An AR party game for 2-8 players Place your virtual gameboard Take turns passing around the device And don't forget to get down!

"Get Down!" is a 2-8 player AR party game where the goal is to get down! Place your virtual gameboard in the room where everyone can see it. Each person passes the device around and chooses where to move and attack. at the end of each round, tiles that were attacked will rise, and the highest player will lose a life. Last person standing wins!

- created by Matt Camerato
